entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 5.
